com.googlecode.xbean.converters.impl
Class AnnotationBeanConverter

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.xbean.converters.impl.AnnotationBeanConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
BeanConverter
public class AnnotationBeanConverter
extends Object
implements BeanConverter

AnnotationBeanConverter - One way of implementing BeanConverter. This converter performs conversion based on annotation's associated with each property . Note: If you want to do conversion in any other way, you can create your own converter by implementing BeanConverter.

Version:
$Revision: 1.0 $
Author:
Aravind (aravinds86@gmail.com), Pradeep (mitecepradeep@gmail.com).

Method Detail

setConversionList

public void setConversionList(List<Conversion> pConversionList)
This methods add extra conversions passed to the existing conversionList. All extra conversions will be added at the begining of the list. So , extra conversion's will be executed first.

Parameters:
pConversionList -
